subject: Re: I get this stuff toooo.
author: Fiona Broome
full_text:
Hi,

Well, this just showed up in my mail this morning.  Looks like my Yahoo Groups mail is running a little late.

Anyway, I hear "Jesus misses heaven," but the other choices are close, too.

Cheerfully,
Fiona



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
>  From the tape player's speaker it's "Jesus---Promised---Heaven", but after
> digitizing--"Jesus--Is In---Heaven" with -is in- sounding more like a cough.
> Oooor, "Jesus isn't heaven"  yeah, some pair-a-doilies goin' on.
> 
>  Frank-S
>
